title: Sectors Which Will Perform After Corporate Tax Rate Cut
text:
Success! An email was sent to your inbox. Invite your friends to join

This webinar will focus on the Sectors which will perform after recent FM announcement of a Corporate Tax Rate Cut on 20th Sep and stocks in those sectors which have a good growth potential. The different Smallcap, Midcap, Largecap Sectoral stocks to watch will be discussed in detail along with the reasons and parameters for choosing them.The objective is to discuss:1. Sectors Which Will Perform After Tax Cut2. Good Fundamental Stocks from these Sectors to Invest3. Company Tax Rate % Change4. List of Companies benefitting from Tax CutThe Audience for this webinar include Financial Companies, Investors, Traders and Brokers either from Trading firms, Financial Institutions or Freelancers, who want to stay informed and up to date with markets. Also for investors who are looking for a basic guide to understand the process of identifying good fundamental stocks & sectors after the recent Tax Cut.The aim is to enrich the audience with the knowledge of how can one identify Sectors & Stocks to invest in which are expected to outperform in coming months benefitting from the recent FM announcement of Corporate Tax Rate Cut.Mr Shailesh Saraf has an experience of nearly 20 years in the financial market, especially in areas related to capital & derivatives market operations, trading, research and management. Mr Shailesh Saraf has learnt international best practices and continues to strive for nothing but the best in terms of both moral and material growth. Passionate about Research, Mr Saraf spearheads the Research team, constantly striving to give maximum value to our clients, whether it is stocks or mutual funds., a research website andan initiative of Mr Saraf, aims at providing comprehensive updated research and knowledge on all NSE Stocks, whereasprovides an online Direct mutual fund investing platform and empower investors make investment decisions independently.Mr. Shailesh Saraf will be hosting a webinar which will focus on guiding investors on how to study the Growth parameters in Companies Annual & Quarterly Earnings. He will focus on important fundamental parameters like Sales, Operating Profits and Profits after tax. The purpose of the webinar is to empower the Investor to “Be his own Analyst” and invest intelligently by imbibing the knowledge given in the webinar. The webinar aims to make the study of Fundamentals easy for a layman investor.
description: Sign up for the "Sectors Which Will Perform After Corporate Tax Rate Cut" webinar at Investing.com Canada
